product_name: Louis Garneau Palomar Tee Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Though it looks like a regular t-shirt, the men's Louis Garneau Palomar Tee Bike Jersey has technical features for comfort, whether you're hammering trails or riding leisurely with the family. Polyester fabric wicks moisture and dries fast, so you stay cool, dry and comfortable. Zippered multimedia pocket lets headphone cord run inside the jersey. Flatlock seams reduce chafing. Tab lets you attach a blinking safety light. Louis Garneau Palomar Tee Bike Jersey has front and back reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: Though it looks like a regular t-shirt, the men's Louis Garneau Palomar Tee Bike Jersey has technical features for comfort, whether you're hammering trails or riding leisurely with the family.
